name: NotionMind
description: Worked remotely as a Frontend Intern, collaborating with senior developers on CineSpot, a movie and series platform built with React and Tailwind CSS. Gained real-world experience in component-based architecture, REST API integration (TMDb), responsive design, Git version control, Framer Motion animations, and clean UI/UX practices. Contributed to development workflows, participated in team discussions, and improved code quality through peer reviews.

name: Codeworks Services
description: Working as a Full-stack Developer Intern, developing a complete MERN stack web application. Responsible for designing and implementing frontend interfaces using React, building RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express, and managing application data with MongoDB. Gaining hands-on experience in full project development, feature implementation, and real-world development workflows.
